about_the_game:
Enhance your experience in Royal Wars: Farm TD with our Supporter Pack DLC! This pack offers a series of exciting new levels that will challenge your strategy and management skills. Explore vibrant environments and face increasingly powerful enemies while unlocking rewards that enhance your journey in the game.

Additionally, by purchasing the Supporter Pack, you ensure long-term support for your favorite game! This means regular updates, new content, and continuous improvements, all designed to provide an even richer and more engaging experience. Your contribution helps shape the future of Royal Wars: Farm TD, allowing the development team to create new challenges and exciting adventures.

Supporter Pack DLC Features:

  • New Levels: Additional challenges to test your strategic skills.

  • Long-Term Support: Access to future updates and new content, ensuring your experience continues to evolve.

Join the battle and become a true defender of the realm with the Supporter Pack DLC!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:

short_description: Royal Wars: Farm TD is a free-to-play tower defense game where strategy meets luck. Place randomly selected towers, merge them to unlock higher tiers, and defend your kingdom through multiple levels. Plant crystals, manage resources, and prepare for epic battles.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Portugal, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
